```cpp
var query2 = from station in stations
             let code = station[^3..]
             let name = station[0..^3].Trim().ToUpper()
             where code == "LVS" || code == "EUS" || 
                   name.EndsWith("CROSS") 
             select new {code, name};
```

```cpp
Station Codes: 
KGX : KINGS CROSS
LVS : LIVERPOOL STREET
EUS : EUSTON
Station Codes (2):
KGX : KINGS CROSS
LVS : LIVERPOOL STREET
EUS : EUSTON
```
